message: I left my own group, now can't join.  It's stuck in limbo...

I don't think it's possible. Also if all the admins leave a private group, it won't be possible for anyone to join the group and none of the existing members won't be able to modify the group in any way, ever. I think the creator should always be able to both delete his / her group and rejoin it. And when the last admin leaves a group, something like three oldest members could be given admin status automatically.
@miikao +1 yes a great feature if creator can leave a group and come back to admin sometime...
+1 I've created two groups with same name in the attempt to delete the first.
We have also managed to create two groups with similar names. The same people are in both but it would be really useful if we could delete the first one to save confusion.
you can rename and change url if that helps....
+1 to this... I created a group which turned out to be a duplicate. Left the group, and rejoined, and am no longer able to edit/rename as admin.
